entities.name: phoenix

entities.name: harry

relationships.description: Phoenix's body showed unmistakable signs of injuries inflicted by Dark Magic.
Ted Tonks was murdered by the Death Eaters.
Dirk Cresswell was murdered by the Death Eaters.
Bathilda Bagshot was murdered by the Death Eaters.
Gornuk was murdered by the Death Eaters.
Lee introduced Royal, a regular contributor.
River introduced Kingsley, a regular contributor.
Ron burst out in excitement when he heard Kingsley's voice.
Hermione hushed Ron and said 'We know!'
Harry felt fully connected to the outside world for the first time in a long time.
